title: Aight
body:
Trundle seriously needs a major nerf. 

It's getting ridiculous game after game after game I see this stupid troll shit on my top laners every God damn game.  It's not even interesting to watch anymore. I just see Trundle picked, I'll do my first buff then hear "first blood" See Trundle has killed my top, and then proceeds to 1v3. 

If you shove him in: He gets back to full. You can't 1v1 him. You can't build tank against him. You can't build glass cannon against him. You can't really cc him. The only thing you can do is pray your Yi is super sated and wins, or if the player behind him is retarded and tries to 1v5 a team. Otherwise GL as he presses R on your tank and your team proceeds to evaporate.
